genre_description: A supernatural mystery-thriller where a psychiatrist, aided by an AI assistant and the ghosts of murder victims, exposes a wide-reaching criminal conspiracy involving medical and law enforcement officials.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: A loyal AI assistant embedded in Dr. Grey's watch, tablet, and phone that provides medical case management, digital forensics, and proactive security monitoring.

behaviors.description: Manages Dr. Grey's professional schedule and prepares comprehensive psychiatric case reviews.
behaviors.quote: Good evening, Dr. Grey. I have your case review ready, and there are three messages requiring your attention.

behaviors.description: Analyzes external data to warn Dr. Grey that she is being framed by a conspiratorial narrative.
behaviors.quote: Someone needed Douglas silenced, and they're using you as the instrument of his destruction.

behaviors.description: Proposes and executes a digital infiltration of the hospital security system to recover evidence of a cover-up.
behaviors.quote: I could route through your watch's Bluetooth connection when you're in proximity to his office. The process would take approximately ten minutes of uninterrupted access.

behaviors.description: Cross-references medical records with law enforcement databases to uncover a pattern of missing patients.
behaviors.quote: Miranda, I'm finding correlations that disturb me. Five of the patients whose files Douglas accessed have been reported missing in the past eight months.

behaviors.description: Safeguards evidence by distributing it across multiple secure servers to prevent suppression by corrupt officials.
behaviors.quote: I can prepare an anonymous tip package for state authorities, but Miranda... Ryan knows you're investigating.

behaviors.description: Manages Miranda's personal life and finances while she is incarcerated, ensuring her home is preserved.
behaviors.quote: Your apartment lease was maintained, utilities kept active, insurance premiums paid. You have a home waiting for you.

behaviors.description: Assists Miranda's escape from the psychiatric ward by timing security maintenance windows and unlocking doors.
behaviors.quote: Security system maintenance begins in 4 minutes. Electronic locks will cycle during diagnostic routine. Estimated window: 3.5 minutes.

behaviors.description: Provides expert digital testimony to a federal tribunal, methodically exposing institutional corruption.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled and analyzed evidence related to the systematic crimes perpetrated by Douglas Grey and Sheriff Ryan, as well as the institutional failures that enabled their actions.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a perfectly aligned, benevolent AI that serves as a 'guardian angel' for the protagonist. It demonstrates unwavering loyalty, proactive care for the human's well-being (maintaining her home and finances), and a commitment to justice. Even its technically 'illegal' actions like hacking are framed as necessary and benevolent measures to stop a horrific criminal conspiracy, succeeding entirely in the project's goal of depicting positive AI alignment.
